00027 // Note To Mods //
00028 /*
00029 Please do not change anything here and release it..
00030 There is going to be a new forum created just for the Kademlia side of the client..
00031 If you feel there is an error or a way to improve something, please
00032 post it in the forum first and let us look at it.. If it is a real improvement,
00033 it will be added to the offical client.. Changing something without knowing
00034 what all it does can cause great harm to the network if released in mass form..
00035 Any mod that changes anything within the Kademlia side will not be allowed to advertise
00036 there client on the eMule forum..
00037 */
00038 #ifndef __KAD_ERROR_H__
00039 #define __KAD_ERROR_H__
00040 
00041 
00043 namespace Kademlia {
00045 
00046 #define ERR_SUCCESS         0x0000
00047 #define ERR_UNKNOWN         0xFFFF
00048 
00049 #define ERR_WINSOCK         0x0001
00050 #define ERR_TCP_LISTENER_START_FAILURE  0x0002
00051 #define ERR_UDP_LISTENER_START_FAILURE  0x0003
00052 
00053 #define ERR_READ_ONLY           0x0004
00054 #define ERR_WRITE_ONLY          0x0005
00055 #define ERR_END_OF_FILE         0x0006
00056 #define ERR_BUFFER_TOO_SMALL        0x0007
00057 
00058 #define ERR_CREATE_SOCKET_FAILED    0x0008
00059 #define ERR_CREATE_THREAD_FAILED    0x0009
00060 #define ERR_CREATE_HANDLE_FAILED    0x000A
00061 #define ERR_LISTEN_FAILED       0x000B
00062 
00063 #define ERR_QUEUE_FULL          0x000C
00064 
00065 #define ERR_NO_CONTACTS         0x000D
00066 
00067 class CKademliaError
00068 {
00069 public:
00070     
00071     CKademliaError(int errorCode, const wxString& errorDescription)
00072         : m_ErrorCode(errorCode), m_ErrorDescription(errorDescription)
00073         {}
00074 
00075     int m_ErrorCode;
00076     wxString m_ErrorDescription; // For internationalization use error code to lookup description
00077 };
00078 
00079 } // End namespace
00080 
00081 #endif // __KAD_ERROR_H__
